definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to moisten/to grease/to apply (cream, ointment)/to dip a brush in ink

sentences.english: After Gingival retraction, impressions were made and superhard gypsum model were finished.
sentences.chinese: 排龈后制取印模，灌注超硬石膏模型。

sentences.english: Eodiagenesis is characterized by the assemblage of carbonate-analcime-anhydrite, while authigenic kaolinite is found in some strata.
sentences.chinese: 浅埋藏期以碳酸盐～沸石～硬石膏组合为特征。

sentences.english: Regular teeth and ready, take modulus, superhard gesso cut working model.
sentences.chinese: 常规牙体预备，取模，超硬石膏灌制工作模型。

sentences.english: The preparation of anhydrite cement from phosphogypsum produced as the waste of phosphoric acid manufacture has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 利用化工副产品磷石膏制硬石膏水泥的方法。

sentences.english: The anhydrite caused spherulite size of PP diminishing, the quantity increasing.
sentences.chinese: 硬石膏的加入使得球晶尺寸减小，数量增加。

definition: gypsum CaSO4·2(H2O)/plaster/plaster cast (for a broken bone)
